Title: Requires state and county inmates to make medical co-payments
Summary: Requires inmates in state and county-owned or operated correctional facilities to make medical co-payments of seven dollars upon receipt of medical treatment; provides that an inmate shall not be refused treatment for lack of ability to pay co-payment charges; directs all moneys collected to be made available for the operation of such correctional facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring inmates to make medical co-payments
